snippet: Getting a handle on rising prices will require some experimentation.
abstract: Editorial lauds Obama administration proposal aimed at reducing Medicare prescription drug costs by testing different ways of paying for the drugs; counters critics by noting experiments will allow doctors to retain control over what they prescribe, and will provide valuable evidence about how changing financial incentives can impact health care spending.
